JobFullDesc:
Smartsheet is looking for a Recruiting Coordinator to support our growing team of in-house recruiters. You will play an essential part in the creation, administration, and execution of interviews for our Boston/EMEA regions while simultaneously elevating our standards of excellent candidate care and customer service.
This role is remote-eligible and may be performed from any state within the U.S. where Smartsheet is a registered employer. You will report to the Senior Manager of Recruiting who is based in our Bellevue, WA office. 
You Will:

Schedule onsite and remote interviews, demos/presentations, and executive meetings, confirming the details and logistics directly with the candidates
Partner with recruiters, hiring managers, interviewers, executive admins, and the IT/office team to provide a seamless interviewing experience for all involved
Be the point person during onsite interviews, providing excellent candidate care to our guests; when interviews take place remotely, be available to assist with virtual interviews and troubleshoot technical/video conferencing issues that may arise
Support the Talent Acquisition leaders with reporting, recruiting events, and administrative tasks
Provide ad hoc support of recruiters
Perform other duties as assigned

You Have:

2+ years of experience in a high-volume customer-facing role
1+ years of experience with scheduling onsite and remote interviews in multiple time zones 
Proficient, professional experience using G-suite products and Zoom
Experience using an ATS (we use Greenhouse)
Great prioritization and organizational skills
Ability to work in the U.S. on an ongoing basis for any employer

Perks & Benefits:

100% employer-paid medical, dental, and vision coverage for full-time employees
Equity - Restricted Stock Units (RSUs) Equity with all offers
Lucrative Employee Stock Purchase Program (15% discount)
401k Match to help you save for your future (50% of your contribution up to the first 6% of your eligible pay)
Monthly stipend to support your work and productivity
15 days PTO to start, plus Flexible Sick Leave
Teleworking options from any registered location in the U.S. (role specific)
Up to 24 weeks of Parental Leave
Personal paid Volunteer Day to support our community
Opportunities for professional growth and development including access to LinkedIn Learning online courses
Company Funded Perks, including a counseling membership, primary care membership, local retail discounts, and your own personal Smartsheet account

Equal Opportunity Employer:
Smartsheet is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to fostering an inclusive environment with the best employees. We provide employment opportunities without regard to any legally protected status in accordance with applicable laws in the US, UK, and Australia. If there are preparations we can make to help ensure you have a comfortable and positive interview experience, please let us know.
At Smartsheet, we strive to build an inclusive environment that encourages, supports, and celebrates the diverse voices of our team members who also represent the diverse needs of our customers. We're looking for people who are driven, authentic, supportive, effective, and honest. You're encouraged to apply even if your experience doesn't precisely match our job description—if your career path has been nontraditional, that will set you apart. At Smartsheet, we welcome diverse perspectives and people who aren't afraid to be innovative—join us!
